## Proposed solution
Explain the recommended implementation at a high level.
- Key behaviour changes
- UX or API surface changes
- Backward-compatibility / migration notes

### Basic example
Provide a short example showing how the feature would be used (code, CLI or config).

```py
# small usage example or config snippet
```

## Alternatives considered
List other approaches you evaluated and why they were rejected.

- [ ] Behaviour X implemented
- [ ] Tests added and passing (`uv run pytest`)
- [ ] Documentation updated (`uv run poe docs-build` / `uv run poe docs-serve`)

## Priority and scope
- Priority (low / normal / high)
- Scope: small / medium / large
